title: Introduction to C Programming
description: A foundational course exploring the basics of C programming language,syntax,structures.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: An overview of algorithm design and  analysis, focusing on problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Introduces C++ programming with a focus on Data Structures Algorithms implementation.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Covers the fundamental data structures such as arrays , linked lists , stacks , and queues.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Introduces Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles using the Python programming.

title: Software Engineering
description: Explores software development methodologies, design patterns, and project management.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: An introduction to Amazon Web Services,cover cloud computing services infrastructure.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: An introduction to MySQL database management, covering SQL queries and database design.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Develops problem-solving skills  various   enhancing critical thinking and algorithmic.
